REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1618 reute u f BC-CELLTRONICS-<CELT>-DE 04-08 0041

TEXT.TITLE: CELLTRONICS <CELT> DECLARES ONE-FOR-10 SPLIT
TEXT.BODY: Celltronics Inc said its directors declared a one-for-10 reverse stock split of its common stock. It said the split will be payable April 17 to shareholders of record April 16. Reuter
